 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָשַׁח‎</span>] 

**verb Hiph\`il 1.** ==make hard==. 

**2.** ==treat hardly== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be hard, firm, tough***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קסח‎</span> ***hardness, severity, cruelty***, [[BDB#SabDenkm|SabDenkm]]<sup>37</sup>); — 

**1.** ***make hard, stubborn, Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּקְשִׁיחַ‎</span> (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵב‎</span> [[Isa.63.17|Isa 63:17]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִיִּרְאָתֶ֑ךָ‎</span>). 

**2.** ***treat hardly, roughly*** (of ostrich), ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִקְשִׁיחַ‎</span> [[Job.39.16|Job 39:16]] (with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּנֶיהָ‎</span>; read 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִקְשִׁיחָה‎</span> [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]); &lt; ([[BDB#Di|Di]]) ***Infinitive absolute*** ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:113z»§ 113z</sup>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקְשֵׁיח‎</span> [[BDB#Ew|Ew]], or ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּקְשִׁיח‎</span> Hirz [[BDB#Bae|Bae]]<sup>Kau</sup> [[BDB#Bu|Bu]].
